Features
Edges (4 points): Arcane Background (Medium); Spirit Friend; This House Is Clean; Wizard Hindrances: Bloodthirsty+; Habit; Pacifist Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Medium): Has I See Dead People and Magic features
Habit: Has an irritating but harmless compulsion
Magic: May take edges particular to Arcane Background (Magic)
Combat
Parry: 5 (3) Cover: 4 Toughness: 8 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Kevlar Riding Jacket Shield: Riot Shield Weapons: Billy Club (d4+d4); Derringer (2d4 R3"); Ruger (2d4 R10"); Unarmed (d4+d0)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Bloodthirsty+: Treats foes cruelly and never takes prisoners
Pacifist: Will harm others only when no other option is available
Arcana
Power Count: 3 Power Points: 15
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Medium): 3 Powers/15 Power Points
I See Dead People: Has continuous Detect Arcana effects for incorporeal and invisible creatures
Spirit Friend: Can communicate w/a magical, Wild Card ethereal spirit that stores 5 Power Points

Wizard: May spend 1 Power Point to change a Power trapping
